attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The idea of this petition is to bring  MP's back into touch with the reality that their voters have to endure life on a lot less money.

If an MP can't manage life on £60,000 + expenses, then there are plenty of people including me who would give it a go.

The opportunity to be that well paid for rubber stamping European parliament legislation is a dream job for most of us.
I am sure the queue for the jobs would go round the block & then some.

MP's are not "Oliver", they get more than enough already.
The MP who said only the rich would enter politics unless they get a 10% payrise, well I have news for you.
You are rich already!
